info.name: Black Slickdeals Redesign
info.description:
This is a black theme for Slickdeals. The current design only affects the pages when you aren't logged in.

Logging in loads the classic view for the site which will be added later.
info.additionalInfo:
v 0.7 (2018-07-16)
- Updated for home page featured deals table structure.

v 0.6 (2017-11-19)
- Added modal subtext style.

v 0.5 (2017-11-14)
- Added user post names in deal discussions.

v 0.4 (2017-10-26)
- Updated forum dropdowns.

v 0.3 (2017-10-24)
- Updated search results page.

v 0.2 (2017-10-23)
- Updated modal windows.
- Updated coupons.

v 0.1 (2017-10-21)
- Initial upload.
